issues.description: In the solution version of fix_vec_sub.asm the symbol directive for fix_vec_sub_asm differs from the template: the template declares it as a global (exported) symbol, but the solution declares it as extern. This mismatch will prevent correct symbol visibility/linking when assembling and linking the studentâ€™s code.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm replace the line `extern fix_vec_sub_asm` with `global fix_vec_sub_asm` so that the symbol visibility matches the template and allows correct linking.
